introduce.intro_1: I'm a developer who builds web and mobile apps, always aiming for better code and better UX.
introduce.intro_highlight_1: I focus on improving product quality and user experience.
introduce.intro_2: As AI evolves, clear communication and understanding service direction matter more than ever.
introduce.intro_4: growing as a developer while delivering real value to your business.

computer_lang.name: HTML
computer_lang.note: Understands semantic structures and it's purpose, and writes markup that follows web standard

computer_lang.name: CSS
computer_lang.note: Skilled in layout and styling, and can flexibily respond to various libraries like Tailwind CSS

computer_lang.name: JavaScript
computer_lang.note: Understands synchronous/asynchronous processing, and adapts to open-api APIs such as ChatGPT, maps, and chart libraries.

computer_lang.name: TypeScript
computer_lang.note: Uses type and interface appropriately, applies generics, and is styding utility and conditional type

computer_lang.name: React
computer_lang.note: Familiar with component-driven development, with experience in separating components case-by-case and refactoring them into reusable structures. Also understands CSR and the rendering process.

computer_lang.name: React
computer_lang.note: Understands different rendering strategies in Next.js and when to apply SSR, CSR, ISR, and SSG.

computer_lang.name: React
computer_lang.note: Has experience with functions like Naver Maps, image upload, and search API. Also experienced distribution from build APKs to releas
